name: He who gets mauled
description:
We made this for the 'Game like it's 1924' game jam.

It is based on 'Poirot Investigates' and 'He who gets slapped' which are 1924 properties that became public domain this year.

Credits:

Story - Yash Kulkarni & Debashish Mahapatra

Writing & Coding - Yash Kulkarni

Art - Debashish Mahapatra
